name: Rochelle McCovery
text: These girls are great. They also have a Vegan option and it was amazing!! Check em out!

name: Dorothy Sloan
text:
Great hot dog and Conecuh delta dog Which I added lite coleslaw
The bread/ bun was everything for me
I will definitely be returning to try different flavors
This hotdog stand is definitely worth the price unlike Five Guys restaurants hot dogs

resp.text: Thank you so much Dorothy for your review. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your experience and that you will be coming back.

name: Clifford Coleman
text:
OMG!!! What can I say...The Hotdoghery food truck has THE ABSOLUTE, HANDS DOWN BEST hot dogs and Conecuh dogs in Mobile! Their food is great and their level of professionalism, customer service and kindness are even greater!
These ladies were recently set up in our apartment complex on a Friday evening and although my sister and I caught them as they were LITERALLY closing up shop and leaving for the evening, these ladies STILL took out valuable time and opened back up just for us to take our orders!

Both of these ladies were SO kind to us and they served us as if we were their FIRST customers of the day, even though we were their LAST ones of the evening. Our food looked amazing and was very well prepared, not rushed. They didn’t serve us the typical “end of business” scraps that others likely would’ve served us and that really meant a lot to my sister Alisha and I. I gladly recommend anyone to grab a tasty bite from the Hotdoghery food truck when you can. You won’t be disappointed. 💯🙂😋

resp.text: You seriously are the best! Thank you for this beautiful review!

name: Amber C
text: Incredibly rude. Was told the total was $15.18 and after the charge cleared my account it was $18.18. I wasn’t asked to leave a tip or to approve of one, that’s fraud. And I’m not one to refuse tip to waitstaff and servers, but never giving an option to approve of one is fraud and illegitimate.

name: alateacher
text: Was super disappointed when they came out to our school, I waited an hour and a half after placing an order through text, and they charged a “mandatory” 15% tip to my debit card. Hot dog was good, but my kid’s nachos were stale and soggy. Overall, poor communication, and I felt like I was stolen from.

name: Hillary West
text: I drove 20 minutes to buy 3 hotdogs. I realized after getting home that 2 out of 3 of the hotdogs I ordered was wrong. I called and the lady told me very rudely that she would fix my order and call me. Drove 20 more minutes back out there to wait 20 more minutes. The order was still wrong but I kept them because I couldn’t wait any longer. I then saw on my account that I was charged more money then I was told when I paid. Very disappointing!

resp.text:
Good Morning Hillary,

We want to apologize for your recent experience and hate to hear of your disappointment in your interaction with our food truck. We hate your expectations were not satisfied.

We set high standards with our business and pride ourselves on our customer service  however we failed to come through for you.  Our customers are our number one priority.

There was a  miscommunication internally with the posting of our where abouts on this particular day as it was suppose to remain a private event. We had a very small time frame to serve the teachers as we are still dealing with Covid.  Being an essential resource to our community and surrounding areas our tasks were not prepared to accept walk up patrons on this day and in turn caused errors to be made and we take full responsibility!!

The difference in the charges you mentioned was most likely the automatic gratuity on the amount purchased paying with your credit card.

Please allow us another chance to redeem our business code that we pride ourselves on and give you the experience you were denied.

We’ll be in touch, or please give me a call at 251-895-8499 if it's more convenient for you, looking forward to speaking with you.

‍Best Regards,
Kim McDonald
Owner
‍‍The Hotdoghery, LLC
251-895-8499

name: Jennifer Daniels
text: These spunky girls are amazing! Friendly fast and the gourmet dog are fantastic!  Kids love em too!  Totally come back!

resp.text:
Jennifer, Thank you for taking the time to review us.
We are so glad you love us and the food!
We look forward to seeing you soon! xoxo Jess & Kim

name: jana bennett
text: This was delicious ! !  Hubby & I enjoyed lunch, thanks again girls

name: Ann Biggs
text:
Omgosh I love this place!
The best Hotdog I’ve ever eaten.
I was so surprised by the taste, i was hooked my very 1st time trying it.
Can’t wait to see y’all in Semmes more often....
I want a Breakfast dog👌🏻
If you haven’t tried them, I suggest you do, don’t know what you’re missing!!!

resp.text:
Thank you for this!!!
We love us too!!I just got chills thinking about those breakfast dogs!! 🌭👯‍♂️
We greatly appreciate your feedback!!

name: Jason Stewart
text: Outstanding culinary masterpieces prepared with precision by an amazing duo of aficionados!

resp.text: Jason, we LOVE your comment. Each dog is made with love. We are thankful for each of our loyal customers, especially when they leave us 5-star reviews, and refer us to all of their friends.
Thank you for the kind words, we appreciate you & are glad you enjoyed the experience!  we look forward to seeing you in the near future! xoxo Jess & Kim

name: Verna Weatherly
text: Great hotdogs! !! You get your money worth.

resp.text: Thank you Verna! You are by far one of our favorite hotdoggers.We appreciate your feedback and cant wait to see you soon! xoxo Jess & Kim
Kelly, Thank you for the love! We look forward to seeing you in the near future! xoxo Jess & Kim

name: Alicia Endsley
text: Loved the fried green tomatoes!  Absolutely delicious.  Even the shrimp tacos are amazing!

name: david mosley
text: Great food and fun ! Hope u guys are still rocking out !

name: William Clark
text: I just had the most amazing gyro from this tiny food truck!! Excellent!  I'm stuffed..... I hope to be back here on Thursdays. 🙏🙏🙏🙏👍

name: Chab is a Plateau
text: I had the “Big Bird” at the Chattanooga Market, and the wait was worth it. It was spectacular.
